name: Baneseed
description:
BANESEED is a stylish top-down multi-directional shooter that features procedurally generated, dynamic encounters of increasing difficulty.

This is a beta version, which currently only supports keyboard/mouse controls, and has no audio. If you enjoy it and would like to see continued development, please let us know.

We'd like to give a shout out to the Godot team for a killer engine, and to Warning Forever, which was a definite inspiration for this game.
